text: Alfredo Baquerizo Moreno (28 September 1859, in Guayaquil – 20 March 1951) was an Ecuadorian politician. He served as Vice President of Ecuador of Leónidas Plaza and Lizardo García from 1903 to 1906 and as President of Ecuador three times in August - September 1912, September 1916 – August 1920 and October 1931 - August 1932. He was a member of the Ecuadorian Radical Liberal Party. ==Other websites== * Official Website of the Ecuadorian Government about the country President's History Category:1859 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Alfredo Baquerizo
